body.name: wansview 2K Light Bulb Security Camera - 2.4G WiFi Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor Indoor for Home Security, 360° Auto Tracking, 24/7 Recording, Color Night Vision, Compatible with Alexa
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 35 mins
features: Quick and Easy Installation for Bulb Camera: It is a true wireless camera that is easy to install and operate. Simply screw it into a light socket and follow the in-app instructions to connect to your 2.4GHz WiFi(5GHz WiFi is NOT supported). No additional power supply is required, making the installation process effortless. The item needs to be inserted into the E27 lamp head. Wansview light socket security camera is equipped with a light socket extender and conversion head inside each package.

Crystal Clear 2K Image & Color Night Vision: With 2K Ultra resolution, the light bulb security camera provides superior image quality that allows you to easily recognize faces and details. The security light bulb with camera has six floodlights and six IR lights, which provide clear, colored images even in complete darkness. You can easily monitor your home or business during the day or night, and easily recognize any potential threats or intruders.

Motion Tracking/Siren/Notifications & 24/7 Recording: The lightbulb security camera outdoor is equipped with motion tracking technology that can detect and follow moving objects. It can also sound an alarm and give out white light to scare off intruders.The security camera supports 24/7 recording to the cloud or a TF card (up to 128GB, not included), so you never miss a moment. It will send you real-time notifications when it detects any motion, maximizing the security of your home and property.

Waterproof Camera for Outdoor & Indoor use with 360-Degree View: The waterproof wireless security camera outdoor has a 355° pan and 65°tilt range, allowing you to achieve a complete 360-degree view of your surroundings. You can easily monitor multiple areas of your home, driveway, hallway, garage, or back door with just one camera.

Two-Way Audio/Multi-Device & User Share: With built-in microphone and speaker the security camera outdoor allows for two-way communication so you can talk and listen to anyone on the other side. It is useful for communicating with babysitters, or pets. You can also create several accounts and share the camera with your family or friends. This way everyone can stay connected and protected. It is compatible with Alexa & Google Assistant, allowing you to control the camera with voice commands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Secuirty Camera
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Wansview 2K Light Bulb Security Camera, and I couldn't be happier with my choice! This ingenious product has seamlessly merged cutting-edge security technology with everyday lighting, resulting in a versatile and efficient solution for my home.First and foremost, the installation process was a breeze. I connected the camera to my 2.4G WiFi network without any hiccups, and the accompanying app guided me through the setup effortlessly. The app's user-friendly interface is a huge plus, allowing me to easily monitor and control the camera.The video quality is outstanding! The 2K resolution provides crisp and clear visuals, ensuring that I never miss a single detail, whether it's day or night. The night vision capability is truly impressive, delivering sharp images even in low-light conditions. I can now rest assured that my home is under constant watch, providing a sense of security like never before.One of the standout features of this product is its inconspicuous design. The camera is cleverly concealed within a light bulb, making it virtually undetectable to the naked eye. This discreet design is perfect for maintaining the aesthetics of my home while keeping an eye on things.The motion detection and alerts have been spot-on. I receive instant notifications on my smartphone whenever any movement is detected, allowing me to take immediate action or keep tabs on daily activities. The two-way audio feature is a game-changer – I can communicate with visitors or even deter potential intruders directly from my phone.Another aspect I appreciate is the durability and weather resistance of the camera. I installed it outdoors, and it has withstood various weather conditions without a hitch. The camera's solid build gives me confidence in its long-term performance.In conclusion, the Wansview 2K Light Bulb Security Camera has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. It seamlessly combines high-quality surveillance with functional lighting while maintaining an elegant and unobtrusive design. If you're in the market for a top-notch security solution that doesn't compromise on aesthetics, this product is a clear winner. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to enhance their home security setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Ingenious Security Solution for Peace of Mind!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the Wansview Bulb Security Camera for my home, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. This little gem has proven to be a game-changer when it comes to home security and monitoring. Here's why I'm giving it a solid five stars:**Installation and Setup (5/5):**Setting up the Wansview Bulb Security Camera was a breeze. The included instructions were clear and easy to follow. I had it up and running within minutes, thanks to the user-friendly Wansview app. The camera seamlessly connected to my 2.4G WiFi network without any hiccups.**Design and Discreetness (5/5):**The camera's design is brilliant. It looks just like a regular light bulb, which makes it blend seamlessly into my outdoor lighting fixtures. This discreet design is a major plus because it doesn't draw unwanted attention.**Video Quality (4/5):**The video quality is impressive, especially considering the compact size of the camera. It captures clear 1080p footage during the day and provides decent night vision as well. While it might not be as sharp as some high-end cameras, it more than meets my expectations for surveillance purposes.**Motion Detection (5/5):**The motion detection feature is highly responsive. I receive instant alerts on my smartphone whenever there's activity in the camera's field of view. Customizing motion zones and sensitivity levels through the app is a convenient feature that ensures I'm only alerted to relevant events.**Two-Way Audio (5/5):**The two-way audio functionality is a great addition. I can communicate with visitors or potential intruders through the app, which adds an extra layer of security and convenience. It's also handy for talking to delivery drivers or checking in on my pets.**Storage Options (4/5):**The camera offers both cloud and local storage options. While the cloud subscription is reasonably priced, I opted for a local microSD card to store my footage, which works flawlessly.**Price Point (5/5):**The Wansview Bulb Security Camera is a budget-friendly option without compromising on quality and features. It offers incredible value for the price.In summary, the Wansview Bulb Security Camera Outdoor is an excellent investment for anyone looking to enhance their home security without breaking the bank. Its easy setup, discreet design, and reliable performance make it a top choice in the world of home surveillance. I couldn't be happier with this purchase, and I highly recommend it to others seeking peace of mind for their property.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, excellent quality, and love the app!
reviews.reviewText: I only bought one of these cameras because I wasn't sure if I would like the app or product. I already use Blink and have Amazon echo products. So far this app is my favorite out of all of them, it's designed well and has a lot of options. It also is fast to upload and display video where echo is slow and blink is similar. The camera also swivels! The other two I have don't move and now that I found one that moves, I wouldn't go back to not having that option. You can save your favorite postions once you find them and you can zoom in to see better. You can set schedules to turn on motion detecting which is very easy to do. I like to call in to check on my pets and I'm not always in a place where I can have my sound on. The wansview app sound comes through my headphones, if I call into blink the sound will come through the phone which can be embarrassing, I cannot find the setting to change it and really just find the blink app lacking and disappointing. I got the blink devices because I thought they would be in the Alexa app but its own app. If I'm going to add new apps then I would want something user friendly like the wansview app with this camera. Also included is an extension which came in handy as the socket I chose was too deep without it. Also included is a regular outlet plug-in, if you didn't want to use a socket. I like that it's included because you may change your mind or want to move it somewhere without a socket so the variety makes it much more usable. I am so pleasantly surprised with this purchase!
